updateCommand.name: update-AUD_NUMBER
updateCommand.required: xpath:count(Activations/TOBEConfiguration/Station/feature[@id='element:stationkey_id-AUD' and primary_value=''])=0 and count(Activations/ASISConfiguration/Station/feature[@id='element:stationkey_id-AUD' and primary_value=''])=0 and Activations/ASISConfiguration/Station/feature[@id='element:stationkey_id-AUD']/primary_value != Activations/TOBEConfiguration/Station/feature[@id='element:stationkey_id-AUD']/primary_value
